message.raw:
I would say that for Simbody we are currently doing this.

There is an [upstream repository checker job](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/upstream-simbody/job/simbody-upstream-checker) which check once a day the changes in simbody repo. If something changed, it will trigger our default [gazebo on nvidia](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-default-devel-quantal-amd64-gpu-nvidia/) job which is already using simbody for all builds.

I will configure the same, with a special dart job, for DART.
message.html:
I would say that for Simbody we are currently doing this.

There is an upstream repository checker job which check once a day the changes in simbody repo. If something changed, it will trigger our default gazebo on nvidia job which is already using simbody for all builds.

I will configure the same, with a special dart job, for DART.
